description: * Emergency Information is developed in order to keep all the emergency medical information & emergency contacts in one place.     * Emergency Information lets you have that information quickly accessible.     * Because you never know when you’ll need it.     * Hospitals can then access your critical medical information and know whom to call.   FEATURES:      * Emergency Contact list – Whom to call & phone number.     * List all your allergies information - What you are allergic to & how to react.     * List your medication information – The name, dosage & the frequency of the medication.     * Record all your personal data like name, blood type, date of birth etc     * Clean user interface.
